snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes Google making it easier to sign up for its fast broadband as a deadline approaches, the art of copying Apple and a...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes Google making it easier to sign up for its fast broadband as a deadline approaches, the art of copying Apple and a man who has remade his home office in the Apple image.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Valuing Online Restaurant Reviews, and Imperfect Copying
